snippet: Five gay couples had asked the state to overturn a constitutional amendment approved by voters in 1998 that defined marriage as being between one man and one woman.
abstract: Federal Judge Timothy M Burgess strikes down Alaska's first-in-the-nation ban on same-sex marriages.
lead_paragraph: Five gay couples had asked the state to overturn a constitutional amendment approved by voters in 1998 that defined marriage as being between one man and one woman.

headline.main: Judge Blocks Alaska Gay Marriage Ban
headline.print_headline: Judge Blocks Alaska Gay Marriage Ban

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
